translations: v．后退，退缩：因恐惧、厌恶或痛苦而突然向后退或跳跃。
· She recoiled in horror when she saw the spider.
她看到蜘蛛时，恐惧地往后退缩。

sentences.sentence: He recoiled in horror at the sight of the corpse.
sentences.translation: 他一见到尸体就吓得往后缩了。

sentences.sentence: She recoiled from the idea of betraying her own brother.
sentences.translation: 背叛自己亲兄弟的这个想法使她感到恐惧。
